ninja.bytecode.shuriken.bukkit.api.world

Class Chunklet

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.bytecode.shuriken.bukkit.api.world.Chunklet

  • public class Chunklet
extends java.lang.Object
    4x4 chunklet area based on the chunk grid
